body: As I was browsing the front page I thought this was real, until I noticed the guild name. It's getting more difficult by the day to see the difference between satire and reality.
body_html: As I was browsing the front page I thought this was real, until I noticed the guild name. It's getting more difficult by the day to see the difference between satire and reality.
